message: This is a problem we are very aware of...stay tuned :)
Some groups have very active commenting that I have moved on from. Any way to mute and/or hide - ignore a topic? I would love some of the noise to fade in groups I am still very interested in.
But yeah I'm in a ton of groups so I feel your pain
@ericflo Thanks, it is becoming more important -- especially on the popular groups I'm in.
